Description.Text:
Property Location
With a stay at Vice Versa, you'll be centrally located in Paris, convenient to Paris Expo Porte de Versailles and Eiffel Tower. This hotel is close to Arc de Triomphe and Louvre Museum.

Rooms
Make yourself at home in one of the 37 air-conditioned rooms featuring iPod docking stations and LCD televisions. Complimentary wireless Internet access keeps you connected, and satellite programming is available for your entertainment. Private bathrooms have complimentary toiletries and hair dryers. Conveniences include phones, as well as safes and desks.

Rec, Spa, Premium Amenities
Relax at the full-service spa, where you can enjoy massages. This Art Deco hotel also features complimentary wireless Internet access, concierge services, and gift shops/newsstands.

Dining
Take advantage of the hotel's room service (during limited hours). Quench your thirst with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge.

Business, Other Amenities
Featured amenities include express check-in, express check-out, and complimentary newspapers in the lobby.


Check-in time starts at 2 PM Check-out time is 11 AM
Take advantage of the hotel's room service (during limited hours). Quench your thirst with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge.
Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.
  • No onsite parking is available.

With a stay at Vice Versa, you'll be centrally located in Paris, convenient to Paris Expo Porte de Versailles and Eiffel Tower. This hotel is close to Arc de Triomphe and Louvre Museum.
Distances are calculated in a straight line from the property's location to the point of interest or attraction, and may not reflect actual travel distance.

Distances are displayed to the nearest 0.1 mile and kilometer.

Paris Expo Porte de Versailles - 0.6 km / 0.3 mi
Georges Brassens Park - 1 km / 0.6 mi
Aquaboulevard - 1 km / 0.6 mi
Stade de la Plaine - 1 km / 0.6 mi
Andre Citroen Park - 1.1 km / 0.7 mi
Hopital Europeen Georges Pompidou - 1.2 km / 0.8 mi
Beaugrenelle - 1.3 km / 0.8 mi
Pont Mirabeau - 1.6 km / 1 mi
Pasteur Museum - 1.6 km / 1 mi
Pont de Grenelle - 1.6 km / 1 mi
Statue of Liberty - Paris - 1.6 km / 1 mi
UNESCO Headquarters - 1.9 km / 1.2 mi
Maison de la Radio - 1.9 km / 1.2 mi
Necker-Enfants Malades Hospital - 1.9 km / 1.2 mi
Pont de Bir-Hakeim - 2 km / 1.2 mi

The nearest airports are:
Paris (ORY-Orly) - 12.9 km / 8 mi
Paris (CDG-Roissy-Charles de Gaulle) - 27.7 km / 17.2 mi

The preferred airport for Vice Versa is Paris (CDG-Roissy-Charles de Gaulle).

You must present a photo ID when checking in. Your credit card is charged at the time you book. Bed type and smoking preferences are not guaranteed.Your reservation is prepaid and is guaranteed for late arrival. The total charge includes all room charges and taxes, as well as fees for access and booking. Any incidental charges such as parking, phone calls, and room service will be handled directly between you and the property.

Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.
  • No onsite parking is available.
